content: this text is a summary of a legal case regarding the opening of a succession the court ruled that the succession is open and determined the entitled heirs and their respective shares they also ordered the dissolution of community property and assigned ownership of a specific property to one of the parties the court applied legal principles from the civil code and the civil procedure code the case concluded based on a previous judgment and the nullity of the service of the introductory summons the plaintiffs claim for an occupation allowance was found to be unfounded the defendants request for the allocation of undivided property was granted and the division of shares was determined based on the appraised value of the property the costs of the litigation were to be compensated by the parties the tribunal made a final ruling on a motion and disregarded it they conducted a preliminary inquiry and declared the succession open they determined the entitled shares of the heirs involved and ordered the dissolution of community property they assigned a real estate unit to the heirs and determined the expenses to be paid by one of the parties any remaining claims were dismissed and the parties were ordered to pay their respective shares of the costs the decision was made on july 26 2022
